g:HTMLPanel.p: My teaching philosophy states that everyone is born with musical ability. I believe that every person can learn to play the piano and express themselves through music. Music is an all encompassing field and I teach my students note reading, improvisation, composition, music history and theory. As a member of two national music teaching organizations, NFMC and MTNA, I stay current on teaching methods and have many performance opportunities available to my students.
Rates include library materials and participation in studio recitals.
There are currently openings for new students for early afternoon. Some daytime hours are also available, perfect for those who work evenings, homeschoolers, or kindergarten.
Accompanying and Performance rates are based on the repertoire, number of rehearsals, travel time, and performance venue. Please contact me for scheduling information and a repertoire list.
